A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Ugh\, just no.  This movie was boring and had no real direction.  The whole Canto Bight casino planet arc should have been cut\, as well as Rose.  I'd much rather see Finn pair up with Poe again that listen to her cheesy lines and hear her lecture on social injustices....blurg.

Rey is Mary Sue who with less training than my dog\, seems to be a master Jedi.  Ben/Ren seems conflicted but not like Anakin did.  He reminds me of my angsty teen neighbor.

Leia brings herself back from the dead in a scene as tacky as Vader yelling "NOOOOOOOOO" in episode 3.  And Luke\, poor Luke.  He is now a hermit sucking on a walrus for milk living with fish maids.  Really.

Please\, give Luke a better ending\, dump Rose\, give Ren some balls and cut the SJW crap.
